climbs.name: Use a Gun, Go to Jail

content.description: The climb is mostly friction with a bit of edging. The rock is somewhat gritty but it poses no problem. It is located at the end of the Sheep Pass parking area between Ryan Campground and the Sheep Pass Group Camping area. Walk along the road and around Grotto Rock going to the right and look left. It is obvious from there. It is the climb on the left and is in the sun most of the day.
content.protection: There are three bolts in good condition and a single remaining rap anchor that is rusted and to me questionable. We did not use it and instead climbed around to the top of Enter at your own risk (5.9) and used the boulder set up with slings to rap off of.

content.description: Friction with some edging. Rock is a bit gritty but not a problem. It is to the right of "Use a gun, go to jail". Mostly in the sun until later afternoon. Located at the end of the "Sheep Pass" parking area between "Ryan" campgrounds and "Sheep Pass" group camp grounds. Walk along the road headed towards the group camping area and around the first rock formation. Take immediate right as soon as you pass it and look to the rock face on your left. There you will see both routes (Use a gun, go to jail 5.9+ and Enter at your own risk 5.9)
content.protection: three bolts, rap off of boulder with long webbing. Three there currently. Two old and crispy, one new as of 9/2003
